channel.title: Instagram on Hi! I'm Natan Santolo
channel.description: Recent content in Instagram on Hi! I'm Natan Santolo

item.title: Instagramas
item.description: I built this simple component for Marcela’s Website, the idea is to show the latest pictures you’ve published in your Instagram. I tried to make it flexible by adding a few configurations, you can choose the type of render, amount of images, also some flags to hide tags and favorites. See all the possible configurations and examples. I also made a test page where you can find more example implementations and some notes about styling.
